title.rendered: 6 Days of Extraordinary Wildlife Safari and Cultural Tour

content.rendered:
6 Days / 5 Nights

  • Northern Circuit Zone

Extraordinary Wildlife Safari and Cultural Tour

Safari Overview

Embark on the 6-Day Northern Circuit Wildlife Safari ,Get to enjoy wildlife sightings at your own pace. The adventure takes you through some of the most stunning landscapes in Tanzania, including the Serengeti Plains, Ngorongoro Crater, and the Tarangire national park.

Throughout the journey, you’ll have time to observe and appreciate the diverse wildlife in their natural habitats without rushing. You’ll get to see majestic elephants, graceful giraffes, powerful lions, and much more in their element.

Quick Links

  • Day by Day Itinerary
  • Cultural Tour Offer
  • Serengeti Hot Air Ballon
  • Inclusion And Exclusion
  • Related Safari
Enquire this Tour

Day By Day Itinerary

Day 1

Arrival At The Kilimanjaro International Airport/Arusha Airport-Arusha.

On your arrival day you will be welcomed by MAASAI LADY ADVENTURE’S heading to Arusha Town for relaxation, dinner and overnight while preparing yourself for the next adventure in Tanzania.

Day 2

Arusha-Tarangire National Park.

After an early breakfast  you,will depart  You will depart  to the Tarangire national park for the full day game drive, The park is well-known for its Highest concentration of Elephant herds,big ancient Baobab trees, big cats like leopards, lions and cheetahs,when your in the park you can see animals like elephants, elegant Girrafes, painted donkey’s (zebras),Warthogs (pumba),buffaloes, wildebeest, hippopotamus, beautiful bird species ,and so many other animals, we will enjoy the game until the late afternoon, heading to the maasai village for some beautiful moments, After spending some time we will leave heading to the Accommodation for relaxation ,dinner and overnight.

Day 3

Serengeti National Park.

After breakfast we will leave the accomodation heading to the serengeti national park via Ngorongoro Conservation Area, the park is well-known for the annual Great Migration, BIG FIVE animals like Lion, Leopard, Elephant, Buffaloes and rhino, in this park you can see animals like hyenas, painted dogs (hunting wild dogs),painted donkeys (zebra),bird species and so many other animals, we will enjoy the plains of the serengeti until the late afternoon we will drive to the accommodation for relaxation, dinner and overnight.

Day 4

Full Day Serengeti National Park

After breakfast we will leave the accomodation continuing  with another bautfully  day around the serengeti plains,the park is well-known for the annual Great Migration, BIG FIVE animals like Lion, Leopard, Elephant, Buffaloes and rhino, in this park you may witness different species of animals from BIG CAT’S, to beautiful birds,we will enjoy the game until the late afternoon we will start heading back to the accommodation for relaxation ,dinner and overnight.

Day 5

Serengeti National Park-Ngorongoro Conservation Area.

After breakfast we will leave the accommodation continuing with another incredible game around the serengeti  while spotting Big five animals and other animals species around this amazing park, late afternoon we will sign out the park heading to the Ngorongoro conservation area for relaxation, dinner and overnight.

Day 6

Ngorongoro Crater-Kilimanjaro International Airport/Arusha Airport.

After breakfast we will leave the accomodation descending to the bottom of crater wall floor, The crater is well-known for its unique shape and natural scenery that gives a spectacular view, inside the crater you can spot BIG FIVE animals like Lion,buffaloes, and rarely black rhinos, other cats like cheetahs, Other animals species like hyenas, gazelles, antelopes, painted donkeys (zebras),Warthogs (pumba),waterbuck, hippopotamus ,beautiful bird species and so many other animals ,we will enjoy the game until the mid afternoon we will ascend the heading to Maasai village  in the village you will get to learn and discover more about this unique tribe in Africa,mid-afternoon, we will be heading to the Kilimanjaro airport /Arusha Airport for your departure flight to home.

Trip Offer

We offer our beloved clients,a free-of-charge visit to one of the most famous and unique tribes in Africa, MAASAI TRIBE, Step into Tradition whilst exploring a Maasai Village/boma.

Discover the vibrant culture of the Maasai in Tanzania! Experience their rich traditions, colorful attire, and rhythmic dances. A visit to a Maasai Village offers a unique and enlightening glimpse into the lives of this iconic tribe, Where you can learn more about their unique culture &life style closely,

Is Serengeti Balloon Safari Worth It

Absolutely! Here are a few reasons why you should book this unforgettable experience:

1. Spectacular Views:

Imagine yourself floating/soaring high above the Serengeti plains in a hot air balloon, witnessing the breathtaking sunrise, and getting a bird’s eye view of the sprawling savannah. The panoramic views of the vast grasslands, rolling hills, and diverse wildlife below are truly mesmerizing.

2. Wildlife Encounters:

: Serengeti National Park is renowned for its abundant wildlife, including the annual Great Migration. During your balloon safari, you have the opportunity to witness herds of wildebeests, zebras, giraffes, lions, elephants, and many other species in their natural habitat. The silence of the hot air balloon ensures a peaceful and undisturbed experience.

3. Memorable Experience:

A Serengeti Balloon Safari offers a unique and memorable experience that will stay with you for a lifetime. Floating above the African wilderness, you will feel a sense of awe and tranquility that is hard to replicate. It’s a perfect mix of adventure, luxury, and serenity.

4. Safety First:

Safety is a top priority during a Serengeti Balloon Safari. The operators maintain strict safety protocols and follow international standards to ensure your well-being throughout the entire experience. You can relax and enjoy the ride, knowing that you are in safe hands.

So, don’t hesitate to book your Serengeti Balloon Safari today and embrace the adventure of a lifetime.

IMPORTANT NOTE:

  • Children under 7-yrs are not allowed on hot air balloons.
  • When Making an inquiry ask us to include a hot air balloon.

Trip Inclusion

  • Accommodations.
  • Meals(Breakfast, Lunch and dinner-Full board).
  • Mineral water and soft drinks.
  • Transfer to and from the airport.
  • Park fees.
  • Ngorongoro Crater fee.
  • Professional-private and Experienced driver guide/Tour guide.
  • Concession fees.
  • Government Taxes (VAT).

Trip Exclusion

  • Flights Tickets and visa.

  • Personal expenses.

  • Medical service.

  • Tip to the guide’s.

  • Inquire This Tour
